entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Cambridge Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:26 AM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -41.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cambridge Bay Airport 08:00 AM MST Saturday 18 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -41.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -59
Dewpoint: -45.5°C
Wind: NW 24 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 38.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h. High minus 38. Wind chill near minus 59. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 35 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 35 by morning. Wind chill minus 55 this evening and minus 50 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Saturday 18 February 2023
